body_html:
I can reproduce with

import tensorflow as tf

gs = tf.Variable(0, name='global_step')
inc_gs = gs.assign_add(1)
saver = tf.train.Saver([gs], max_to_keep=2)
with tf.Session() as sess:
  sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())
  for _ in range(3):
    saver.save(sess, '/tmp/ckpts/model.ckpt', gs)
    sess.run(inc_gs)

saver = tf.train.Saver([gs], max_to_keep=2)
with tf.Session() as sess:
  saver.restore(sess, tf.train.latest_checkpoint('/tmp/ckpts'))
  for _ in range(3):
    saver.save(sess, '/tmp/ckpts/model.ckpt', gs)
    sess.run(inc_gs)

@panyx0718, do you know if this is intended?

body:
I can reproduce with

```python
import tensorflow as tf

gs = tf.Variable(0, name='global_step')
inc_gs = gs.assign_add(1)
saver = tf.train.Saver([gs], max_to_keep=2)
with tf.Session() as sess:
  sess.run(tf.global_variables_initializer())
  for _ in range(3):
    saver.save(sess, '/tmp/ckpts/model.ckpt', gs)
    sess.run(inc_gs)

saver = tf.train.Saver([gs], max_to_keep=2)
with tf.Session() as sess:
  saver.restore(sess, tf.train.latest_checkpoint('/tmp/ckpts'))
  for _ in range(3):
    saver.save(sess, '/tmp/ckpts/model.ckpt', gs)
    sess.run(inc_gs)
```

@panyx0718, do you know if this is intended?
